# Section 1

(@) Provide a short name (either a single word or an acronym) for the analytic you plan to develop. 

Boots

(@) Provide a brief title (1-2 sentences) describing - at the 50,000 foot level - what your analytic does.  Your title should be short and to the point, but should also be clear to an end user.

(@) Provide a description (2-3 paragraphs) of why this analytic data product will be useful for an end-user.  This description should address the following points (where applicable).

i) Describe any of the features that your analytic will perform when complete
ii) Describe the typical end-user for whom this analytic is being developed
